articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.title: 35 Cheap Versions Of Expensive Products You’ll Want For Spring - BuzzFeed
articles.description: Your friends are going to be like 🤯 when you tell them how little you paid for this beautiful spring throw blanket that looks *just* like one from Anthropologie.
articles.content: I bought this because I crave that Black Honey and will buy it until the day I die, but I am always paranoid of losing it, so I almost never let it leave my bag. I have tried probably five or six "al… [+739 chars]
